- [93mCosmic[0m [93mSilicate[0m [93mSurfaces[0m [93mCatalizing[0m [93mPrebiotic[0m [93mReactions[0m: [93mAtomistic[0m [92mModeling[0m on the [93mPolymerization[0m of [93mHCN[0m.: [93mHydrogen[0m [93mcyanide[0m, [93mHCN[0m, is a [93mfundamental[0m [93mbuilding[0m [93mblock[0m in [93mastro[0m- and [93mcosmochemical[0m [93menvironments[0m, [93mknown[0m for its [93mability[0m to [93mform[0m [93mprebiotically[0m [93mrelevant[0m [93mmolecules[0m [93msuch[0m as [93mnucleobases[0m. [93mAlthough[0m its [93mpolymerization[0m is [93minhibited[0m under the [93mcold[0m, [93mdilute[0m [93mconditions[0m of the [93minterstellar[0m [93mmedium[0m, the [93mhigher[0m [93mtemperatures[0m of [93mmore[0m [93mevolved[0m [93mrocky[0m [93mbodies[0m, [95mcombined[0m with the [93mpresence[0m of [93mmineral[0m [93msurfaces[0m, [93mcan[0m [93mcatalyze[0m the [93mreaction[0m. In this [93mstudy[0m, [93mwe[0m [93muse[0m [93matomistic[0m [93msimulations[0m [93mgrounded[0m on the [93mdensity[0m [93mfunctional[0m [93mtheory[0m ([93mDFT[0m) to [93melucidate[0m the [93mcomplete[0m [93mtetramerization[0m [91mpathway[0m of [93mHCN[0m to [93mdiaminomaleonitrile[0m ([93mDAMN[0m) and [93mdiaminofumaronitrile[0m ([93mDAFN[0m), [93mcatalyzed[0m by the [93mcrystalline[0m [93mMg[0m [93m2[0m [93mSiO[0m [93m4[0m [93mforsterite[0m ([93m120[0m) [93msurface[0m. [93mResults[0m [93mdemonstrate[0m that the [93mintrinsic[0m [93macid[0m-[93mbase[0m [93mproperties[0m of the [93msurface[0m [93mfacilitate[0m [93mchemical[0m [93mbond[0m [93mformation[0m/[93mcleavage[0m [93mneeded[0m for [93mHCN[0m [93moligomerization[0m, [93mlowering[0m [93mactivation[0m [93mbarriers[0m by ∼[93m120[0m-[93m220[0m [93mkJ[0m [93mmol[0m -[93m1[0m with [93mrespect[0m to the [93mgas[0m-[93mphase[0m. [93mKinetic[0m [93manalyses[0m [93mreveal[0m that the [93mreactions[0m are [93mfeasible[0m at [93mtemperatures[0m above [93m300[0m [93mK[0m, [93mparticularly[0m under [93mconditions[0m [93mpresent[0m in [93mwarm[0m, [93mrocky[0m [93mbodies[0m [93msuch[0m as [93masteroids[0m, [93mmeteorites[0m, and [93mplanetary[0m [93msurfaces[0m. These [93mfindings[0m [93msupport[0m a [92mmodel[0m in which [93mMg[0m-[93mrich[0m [93msilicate[0m [93mminerals[0m ([93mabundant[0m in the [93mearly[0m [93mSolar[0m [92mSystem[0m) [93mmay[0m [93mhave[0m [93mdirectly[0m [93mcatalyzed[0m the [93mformation[0m of [93mcomplex[0m [93morganic[0m [93mmolecules[0m, which, in [93mturn[0m, are [93mprecursors[0m of [93mmore[0m [93mcomplex[0m [93mbiomolecules[0m, [93mthereby[0m [93mcontributing[0m to the [93messential[0m [93mchemical[0m [93minventory[0m for the [93memergence[0m of [93mlife[0m on [93mearly[0m [93mEarth[0m and [93mother[0m [93mprimitive[0m [93mplanets[0m with [93mpropitious[0m [93mconditions[0m.
- A [93mPotential[0m [91mPathway[0m for the [93mSynthesis[0m of [93mBiomass[0m-[93mBased[0m [93mPolyamide[0m [93mMonomer[0m [93m2[0m,[93m5[0m-[93mBis[0m([93maminomethyl[0m)[93mfuran[0m from [93m2[0m,[93m5[0m-[93mFurandicarboxylic[0m [93mAcid[0m.: In this [93mstudy[0m, the [93mtransformation[0m of [93m2[0m,[93m5[0m-[93mfurandicarboxylic[0m [93macid[0m ([93mFDCA[0m) to [93m2[0m,[93m5[0m-[93mbis[0m([93maminomethyl[0m)[93mfuran[0m ([93mBAMF[0m) is [93mproposed[0m and [95minvestigated[0m for the [93mfirst[0m [93mtime[0m. [93mUsing[0m [93mFDCA[0m as the [93msubstrate[0m, the [93mprocess[0m [93minvolves[0m [93mtwo[0m [93mkey[0m [93msteps[0m: [93mfirst[0m, [93mconverting[0m [93mFDCA[0m to [93m2[0m,[93m5[0m-[93mdicyanofuran[0m ([93mDCF[0m) [93mvia[0m [93mcarboxy[0m-[93mcyanation[0m, [93mfollowed[0m by the [93mheterogeneous[0m [93mcatalytic[0m [93mhydrogenation[0m of [93mDCF[0m to [93mproduce[0m [93mBAMF[0m. For the [93mcarboxy[0m-[93mcyanation[0m, [93mtwo[0m [93mammoniation[0m [91mroutes[0m were [93mcompared[0m, [93mincluding[0m the [93mmolten[0m [93mammoniated[0m [93mdehydration[0m [91mroute[0m and the [93mmoderate[0m [93mammoniated[0m [93mdehydration[0m [91mroute[0m. The [93mdifference[0m between the [93mammoniation[0m of [93mbio[0m-[93mbased[0m [93mcyclic[0m [93mdicarboxylic[0m [93macid[0m and that of [93mpetroleum[0m-[93mbased[0m [93maliphatic[0m [93mdicarboxylic[0m [93macid[0m was [93mdiscovered[0m. A [93mmoderate[0m [93mammoniated[0m [93mdehydration[0m [91mroute[0m that is [93mmore[0m [93msuitable[0m for [93mbio[0m-[93mbased[0m [93mcyclic[0m [93mdicarboxylic[0m [93macid[0m [93mhas[0m been [93mdeveloped[0m. [93mSOCl[0m [93m2[0m was [93mfound[0m to [93meffectively[0m [93mactivate[0m the [93mstable[0m [93mcarboxyl[0m [93mgroup[0m and [93mact[0m as a [93mdehydrating[0m [93magent[0m, [93mfacilitating[0m the [93mdehydration[0m of the [93mintermediate[0m [93m2[0m,[93m5[0m-[93mfurandicarboxamide[0m ([93mFDAM[0m) to [93mDCF[0m with [93mhigher[0m [93mefficiency[0m. For the [93mhydrogenation[0m [93mreaction[0m of [93mDCF[0m, [93mRaney[0m [93mCo[0m [93mexhibited[0m [93mexcellent[0m [93mcatalytic[0m [93mperformance[0m, [93machieving[0m a [93m94[0m.[93m5[0m% [93myield[0m of [93mBAMF[0m from [93mDCF[0m. [93mBased[0m on [93mindustrial[0m [93mpractice[0m, this [93mresearch[0m [93mrepresents[0m the [93mfirst[0m [93mexploration[0m of the [91mpathway[0m from [93mbio[0m-[93mbased[0m [93mFDCA[0m to [93mBAMF[0m, which [93mopens[0m a [93mnew[0m [93mline[0m for the [93msustainable[0m [93mproduction[0m of [93mbio[0m-[93mbased[0m [93mdiamines[0m.
